entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Text.Json code gen: ignored properties are not completely ignored #58320
  • IndexOutOfRangeException in WinMD assembly resolution #58319
  • References from one dynamic assembly to another dynamic assembly sometimes do not result in an AppDomain.TypeResolve event #58313
  • Fix VN for float <-> integer reinterpreting casts #58312
  • String.Equals(other, Ordinal) could be faster if the length comparsion was moved up #58310
  • Runtime silent installation progress #58307
  • IsStructMarshalable fails on C# arrays and fixed arrays with explicit bounds and attributes #58305

Closed

  • [JitStressWithRandomNumbers] Assertion failed 'emitTypeSizes[TypeGet(type)] > 0 Generate code' #57913
    7.0.0
  • [JitStressWithRandomNumbers] Assertion failed 'varDsc->TypeGet() != TYP_STRUCT Generate code' #57917
    7.0.0
  • `Graphics.DrawString` fails to render certain unicode characters. #56948
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Refactor fgInitArgInfo to track non standard arg kinds #58324
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update `GetCurrFrame()` assert during x86 function unwind #58323
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Allow RuntimeType arguments in CustomAttributeBuilder #58317
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Fix fgValueNumberArrIndexVal for wide reads #58309
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Nullable improvements for `Microsoft.Extensions.Primitives.StringSegment` №2 #58308
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Primitives, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Support aot without trimming #58306
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Delete test projects under src/tests/hosting #58304
    area-Host, 7.0.0
  • Remove PEDecoder::HasNativeHeader (always false) #58303
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Update native COM server tests to execute directly instead of using the Exe launcher program. #58302
    test enhancement, area-Interop-coreclr

Merged

  • Update Microsoft.DotNet.Helix.Sdk #58281
    area-codeflow
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Support RuntimeType.MakeGenericType with non-RuntimeType elements #58275
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Fix a few corner case overflow operations #58265
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 6.0.0
  • Clean-up duplicated PathInternal files #57988
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Fix a few places where we did not use Register type for struct locals. #58082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Disable fast path serialization for types with properties using custom converters. #58291
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Stop retyping RHSes to byrefs on type mismatch #58297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Set _ep_arch_info for s390x #56427
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Set generic type arguments nullability for value types #58036
    area-System.Reflection, 6.0.0
  • Skip System.Text.Json tests on iOS/tvOS that don't work #58276
    area-System.Text.Json, os-ios
  • [release/6.0] Remove usage of [AggressiveOptimization] #58253
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Enable runtime tests with closed issues #57720
    increase-code-coverage
  • Disable JitStress for Github_25027 #58250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix x86 linux tests #57244
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add documentation to System.Net #57855
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Fix a minor assert issue in long decomposition #57326
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [draft fix for 43752] Mark PLINQ as enabled in WASM and make browser compat changes #58227
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-System.Linq.Parallel
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc1' => 'release/6.0' #58280
    area-codeflow
  • [release/6.0] [wasm] Require workloads if using `@(NativeFileReference)` #58290
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: add PGO random stress testing support #58294
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • roll r2r jobs into crossgen2-outerloop #58282
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Only look for exceptVars when resolving live-out EH vars #58243
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable outerloop helix legs on the "runtime-coreclr outerloop" pipeline. #57068
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Initial document for JIT and GC stress usage #58147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, Future

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-28
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Seg fault on empty ARM application #1463

PullRequests

Merged

  • Merge from dotnet/runtime #1466
  • NativeAOT: Only mark debugger step in/through points on Windows #1467
  • Fix casing of build configurations #1465
    area-NativeAOT

Updated

  • Update LLVM 5.0 -> 12.0 #1461
    area-NativeAOT
  • Collection tests for dfa #1462
  • Move to using the new Roslyn IIncrementalGenerator API for better in-VS performance #1374
    area-DllImportGenerator

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `--no-cache` option to `dotnet workload install` doesn't seem to ignore all caches #20286
  • Downloading workload install packs to cache gives different results depending on whether workload is installed #20285
  • Improve command-line help for `dotnet workload uninstall` #20284
  • Improve command-line help for `dotnet workload install` `--download-to-cache` #20283
  • `--sdk-version` parameter for workload commands should probably be renamed to `--sdk-feature-band` or similar #20282
  • `dotnet workload install` gives incorrect error message if `--sdk-version` specified matches the feature band but doesn't exactly match the SDK version #20281
  • AssemblyTitle Property in Microsoft.NET.GenerateAssemblyInfo.targets isn't case sensitive #20280

Closed

  • Testing out new targets' interaction with solution (SLN) files #336
    2.3.0
  • Final confirmation messages that contain paths to the dropped artifacts need to be highlighted in the output #407
    2.3.0
  • Space in between ids in RuntimeIdentifiers caused restore to fail #430
    2.3.0
  • Provide useful error when user targets Shared Framework that is not installed #458
    2.3.0
  • Enable creating packages on non-Windows builds #612
    2.3.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Test driven RazorSourceGenerator incrementality #20264
    Area-DotNet Test

Updated

  • Update a bunch of test projects to the current target framework #20148
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-28
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Simplifying multiple strings in the parameter. #5116

Updated

  • Proposal: Struct Lambdas #1060

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hot reload/dotnet watch not able to find source generated code #55997
  • Accessing interface members backed by internal classes through dynamic throws Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderException #55996
  • Treat files copied from a NuGet package content as generated #55992
  • Missing System.Int32 type results in hitting compiler assertion #55990
  • Need to provide option to show all signatures in methods. #55989
  • Invoking Value Tracking may not open window right away #55986

Closed

  • [Bug] Syntactically incorrect "auto-fix" for IDE0038 #54980
    Backlog
  • Nullability information is wrong for lambdas in certain situations #55254
    17.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Report and catch error on renaming #55991
    Area-IDE
  • Utilise `PooledObjects.ArrayList(Of T)' in Features\LanguageServices #55988
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55985
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Remove redundant code. #55995
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Freeze semantics for all branches when asked #55910
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix navigation in findrefs #55979
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use lambda expression and method group signature in type inference #55786
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, 17.0.P4

Updated

  • Merge main to features/MoveStaticMembers #55999
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Share 'when' expressions in DAGs when needed #55981
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Pattern Matching, 17.0.P4
  • Don't add async modifier for void return method #55983
    Area-IDE
  • List patterns: subsumption checking #53891
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.0
  • Specify forbidden zone for foreach deconstruction variables. #55982
    Area-Compilers
  • Prevent exception if their is no else block. #55656
    Area-IDE, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor WebAssembly Component CSS not applied when running the published application! #35901
  • Net6P7: Blazor WASM can't upload large files (500MB, 1GB, 2GB) #35899
  • How to include bootstrap or other css library files in .bundle.scp.css #35898
  • Enable compression on blazorpack #35897
  • Startup improvement: https #35895
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries, single_query #35894
  • Bug when using convention and MapFallbackToPage #35893
  • HttpSysException : Failed to accept a request. #35892
  • Blazor WASM AuthorizationMessageHandler caches AccessToken even after user has changed #35888
  • Write to response partially instead of all at once #35887
  • Single file build time regression: plaintext #35881
  • Why I cannot use same tag component in Blazor? #35877

Closed

  • Startup regression: single_query #35723
  • Blazor preserving prerended state does not seem to work #35605
    6.0-rc2
  • Configure of WebHostBuider is not called if UseStartup is also used #35781
  • Revisit suppression of CA1305 in .editorconfig #34361
    6.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • Use GetEndpoint extension method #35886
    community-contribution
  • Warn that UseStartup/Configure/ConfigureWebHost not supported on WebApplicationBuilder #35884
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add support for stating accepts/consumes metadata is required or not #35875
  • Check for `null` Token in WASM Auth #35872
    area-blazor
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc1' => 'release/6.0' #35870
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution

Merged

  • Update helix doc: master => main #35889
    community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Re-enable CA1305 #35867
    7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Add support for WithTags extension method #35672
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • Log time-taken more precisely #35863
    area-runtime
  • Big-endian fixes: Kestrel IP/socket address handling #35713
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Big-endian fixes: Kestrel string processing #35711
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Use ArrayPool as default pool fallback #35719
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0] HTTP/3: Support canceling requests that aren't reading a body #35823
    area-runtime
  • Pass request cancellation token when using IAsyncEnumerable in MVC and WriteAsJsonAsync #35866
  • [release/6.0] HTTP/3: Server cancellation and abort exceptions consistency #35861
    area-runtime
  • Remove unusued using statement (fixes #35840) #35841
    area-mvc

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-28
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Bug] FlexLayout crashes adding children programmatically #2056
  • [Bug] Adding new child to FlexLayout dynamically causes Null Reference Exception. #2138
    6.0.100-rc.2
  • [Bug] FlexLayout NullReferenceException with BindableLayout #2023
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • [Bug] Crash when loading images into FlexLayout #1505
  • [Enhancement] Support Min|Max Height|Width on FrameworkElement #709
    6.0.100-rc.1

Updated

  • Lots of build Error when Creating MAUI Blazor App using VS2022 File New Project Template #2168
  • [Enhancement] Minimal toolset dependency MAUI application #1392
  • Cross platform media player #2292

PullRequests

Created

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #2294
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • Fix issues dynamically adding stuff to a FlexLayout #2291
    6.0.100-rc.1

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Many-to-many AsSplitQuery create redundant sql #25767
  • Run a test pass against SqlClient 3.0 and 4.0 #25766
    6.0.0
  • Cosmos: Support queries into primitive collections #25765
  • Cosmos: Ensure at least parity with SDK LINQ provider #25764
  • sometimes can not catch DbUpdateConcurrencyException ? #25763

Closed

  • SQL Server scaffolding fails because of columns with no database type #25729
    6.0.0
  • Entity created by table splitting is not executed when inserting data #25132
    6.0.0
  • Discover inverse navigations when entity added after being ignored #25279
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Bug when calling DetectChanges repeatedly #21910
  • Report connection security: using SSL or not. #25719
  • Microsoft.Data.SqlClient 3.0.0 breaks async enumeration of results of SQL Server query including null rowversion value #25074
  • Flaky test: Union_non_entity #16365
    6.0.0-rc1

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25771
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Fix to #24671 - Relational: No tests for TranslateContains path #25768

Merged

  • Resiliency to columns with missing types in SQL Server scaffolding #25748
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25744
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Correctly handle adding optional dependents using table splitting without principal. #25757
  • Discover inverse navigations when entity added after being ignored #25762

Updated

  • Query: add translation for string.IndexOf(string, int) #25396 #25655

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-28
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Please provide patch-agnostic URLs for runtime downloads #11040
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, installer, .NET 6.0.1xx SDK, validation-installer-.NET 6.0.1xx SDK #installer-102496-.NET6.0.1xxSDK #11584
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, installer, .NET 6.0.1xx SDK RC 1, validation-installer-.NET 6.0.1xx SDK RC 1 #installer-102457-.NET6.0.1xxSDKRC1 #11587
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, installer, .NET 7.0.1xx SDK, validation-installer-.NET 7.0.1xx SDK #installer-103284-.NET7.0.1xxSDK #11635
